video_description:
Prestigio has prepared a very nice presentation of its first series of MultiPad to see its full functionalities. Prestigio MultiPad Android™ Tablets PCs come with many preloaded apps and widgets. 

Are you looking for a mobile device that has it all? Are eBook readers too small to you? Do you like brilliant colors and enjoy browsing the web? Prestigio MultiPad is your choice! Experience the sleek design, touch screen feature, 7inch color display. Enjoy numerous 3rd party apps, watch videos & photos, read books and listen to your favorite music -- wherever you go!!
title: Prestigio MultiPad 7070 - Amazing Functionalities - Available at PrestigioPlaza.com

comments.text: hello!will 7070 be able﻿ to work with any 3g-usb modem?
comments.author: nikobelictheserb

comments.text: Unfortunately it﻿ is not working with USB-modems. Try to connect PMP7070 to mobile phone by Bluetooth. It should work.
comments.author: PrestigioPlaza

comments.text: : Unfortunately it is﻿ not working with USB-modems. Try to connect PMP7070 to mobile phone by Bluetooth. It should﻿ work.

comments.text: As I﻿ can see, the 7070c and the 7100c are the same, just the size of the screen differs...
comments.author: someone7557

comments.text: is﻿ there the android market preinstalled?
comments.author: wwekingtase10

comments.text: @someone7557: the 7100c also has a USB 2.0﻿ while the 7070C has a mini USB
comments.author: PrestigioPlaza

comments.text: @wwekingtase10: it has AppsLib market preinstalled,﻿ for Android market  you need another model - PMP5080B (perfect for ebooks reading and media entertainment) or PMP7074B3G (this one also has 3G feature, gps reciever and phone calls support)
comments.author: PrestigioPlaza

comments.text:
I see, I just bought one 7100... Actually the﻿ same as an Archos 101IT? Just the color...
And my 7100c had some memory problems and i had to reformat :'( But you guys rule and one of you sent me the download link for QO 3! THX!

P.S.
There's only a two-finger multitouch screen... The 2.2 FW update from archos is nice though...
comments.author: someone7557

comments.text:
I liked this tablet and ordered it ,but I cant understand. It is so easy to install the market why do you sell it with AppsLib?
Very good value for money can we wait for a﻿ official Android 2.3 release by you?
Thank you in advance!
comments.author: Mario95BG

comments.text: Do you know how long the battery lasts if you﻿ are only using it to read ebooks?
